text: Jerzy Oskar Stuhr (18 April 1947 – 9 July 2024) is a Polish movie director, screenwriter, dramatist and actor. Stuhr has directed eight movies since 1994 and he has appeared in many movies. He is the best known as an actor from the movie Seksmisja (1983). Stuhr was born in Kraków, Poland. He died at 9th July 2024 (age 77) in hospital after a long fight with cancer. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Polish movie directors Category:Polish screenwriters Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish playwrights Category:Writers from Kraków Category:Actors from Kraków
title: Jerzy Stuhr
